typeSystemDescription.name: LinnaeusAnnotationTypes
typeSystemDescription.vendor: György Móra University of Szeged, Rgai

typeDescription.name: hu.u_szeged.rgai.bio.uima.tagger.LinnaeusSpecies
typeDescription.description: Species annotation type holds information for Linnaeus species tagger's annotation.

featureDescription.name: mostProbableSpeciesId
featureDescription.description: This feature contains the value of the most probable NCBI Taxonomy Id for the annotated species occurence.

featureDescription.name: allIdsString
featureDescription.description: This feature contains all possible NCBI Taxonomy IDs.

featureDescription.name: ambigous
featureDescription.description: True if the species tagging is ambigous.
